statements: SELECT * FROM subscriber_location WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT email_address, latitude, longitude FROM subscriber_location WHERE timezone = 'EST';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM subscriber_location ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_location WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT DISTINCT timezone FROM subscriber_location;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_location WHERE subscriber_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM subscriber_location WHERE timezone = 'PST' ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, timezone FROM subscriber_location WHERE latitude > 45 AND longitude < -75 ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_location WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40 AND 50 AND longitude BETWEEN -80 AND -70;
SELECT COUNT(subscriber_id) AS total_subscribers, timezone FROM subscriber_location GROUP BY timezone HAVING COUNT(subscriber_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_subscribers DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_name, email_address FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM email_schedule WHERE send_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_name, timezone FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, email_subject FROM subscribers s JOIN email_schedule e ON s.subscriber_id = e.subscriber_id WHERE e.send_time < NOW();
SELECT subscriber_name, email_address FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_schedule WHERE send_time >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, email_subject FROM subscribers s JOIN email_schedule e ON s.subscriber_id = e.subscriber_id WHERE e.send_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT subscriber_name, email_address FROM subscribers WHERE timezone = 'PST' ORDER BY subscriber_name ASC;
SELECT s.subscriber_id, s.subscriber_name, e.email_subject FROM subscribers s LEFT JOIN email_schedule e ON s.subscriber_id = e.subscriber_id WHERE e.email_id IS NULL;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, timezone FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT email, timezone FROM subscribers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM email_schedules ORDER BY send_time DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, timezone FROM subscribers JOIN email_schedules ON subscribers.subscriber_id = email_schedules.subscriber_id WHERE send_time >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT subscriber_id, email, timezone, timezone_name FROM subscribers JOIN email_schedules ON subscribers.subscriber_id = email_schedules.subscriber_id JOIN time_zones ON subscribers.timezone = time_zones.timezone_name ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_id, email FROM subscribers WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT email, timezone FROM subscribers WHERE subscriber_id IN (3, 4, 5);
SELECT * FROM email_schedules ORDER BY send_time DESC;
SELECT subscribers.email, time_zones.timezone_name FROM subscribers INNER JOIN time_zones ON subscribers.timezone = time_zones.timezone_name;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT email_id, subject FROM emails WHERE subject LIKE 'Important%';
SELECT * FROM optimal_send_times WHERE time_slot BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, time_zone_name FROM subscribers JOIN time_zones ON subscribers.timezone = time_zones.timezone_id;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT email_id, subject FROM emails WHERE email_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT content FROM emails WHERE content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM subscribers WHERE timezone = 'PST';
SELECT email_id, subject, time_zone_name FROM emails e JOIN optimal_send_times o ON e.email_id = o.time_id WHERE o.timezone_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, location FROM subscribers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, location, timezone FROM subscribers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM email_schedules WHERE send_time < NOW();
SELECT subscriber_id, send_time FROM email_logs WHERE delivery_status='delivered' ORDER BY send_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT subscriber_id, email FROM subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_logs WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered' ORDER BY send_time ASC;
SELECT email, location FROM subscribers JOIN email_logs ON subscribers.subscriber_id = email_logs.subscriber_id WHERE email_logs.delivery_status = 'failed';
SELECT subscribers.email, email_logs.delivery_status FROM subscribers LEFT JOIN email_logs ON subscribers.subscriber_id = email_logs.subscriber_id WHERE email_logs.delivery_status IS NULL;
